item.title: 铁路运营商 CSX 与信号工工会达成五年协议
item.description: 铁路运营商 CSX 周二表示，它已与铁路信号员兄弟会（BRS）达成一项为期五年的临时协议。【原文：Railroad operator CSX said on Tuesday it had reached a five-year tentative agreement with the Brotherhood of Railroad Signalmen (BRS).】

item.title: 独家报道研究显示：中国秘密网络试图引诱被解雇的联邦工作人员
item.description: 根据招聘广告和揭露这一活动的一名研究人员的说法，一个由一家神秘的中国科技公司运营的公司网络一直在试图招募最近被解雇的美国政府工作人员。【原文：A network of companies operated by a secretive Chinese tech firm has been trying to recruit recently laid-off U.S. government workers, according to job ads and a researcher who uncovered the campaign.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在新飞机研发前摆开阵势
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周二展示了其下一款飞机的技术，这款飞机将在10至15年后投入使用，取代其最畅销的A320neo系列飞机。【原文：Airbus on Tuesday gave a glimpse of technologies for its next airplane, a replacement for its best-selling A320neo family due to enter service between 10 and 15 years from now.】

item.title: 临时领导人表示，孟加拉国将在三个月内达成 Starlink 互联网协议
item.description: 孟加拉国临时领导人周二表示，预计将在三个月内与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的卫星互联网网络 Starlink 达成商业协议，为整个南亚国家提供互联网服务。【原文：Bangladesh's interim leader said on Tuesday a commercial deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX-owned satellite internet network Starlink is expected to be reached within three months to provide internet services across the South Asian country.】

item.title: 克罗格公司在 250 亿美元并购失败后反诉竞争对手阿尔伯森公司
item.description: 美国食品杂货连锁店克罗格（Kroger）周二对竞争对手阿尔伯森（Albertsons）提起反诉，使两家公司之间的法律之争升级，此前，两家公司提出的价值 250 亿美元的合并计划于 12 月被法院否决。【原文：U.S. grocery chain Kroger countersued rival Albertsons on Tuesday, escalating a legal fight between the two companies following the demise of their proposed $25 billion merger that was blocked by courts in December.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份消费者信心进一步恶化
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，3月份美国消费者信心连续第四个月下降，家庭对未来的悲观程度为12年来最高。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence dropped for a fourth straight month in March, with households the most pessimistic about the future in 12 years, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 穆迪称美国财政实力将继续下降
item.description: 评级机构穆迪（Moody's）周二表示，随着预算赤字的扩大和债务负担能力的下降，美国的财政实力有望持续多年下滑。【原文：Ratings agency Moody's said on Tuesday the United States' fiscal strength is on track for a continued multi-year decline as budget deficits widen and debt becomes less affordable.】

item.title: 卡尼称加拿大洛克希德-马丁公司战斗机合同可能调整
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周二表示，如果其执政的自由党在4月28日的大选中获胜，渥太华将研究如何调整购买88架洛克希德-马丁公司F-35战斗机的计划。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney on Tuesday said if his ruling Liberals won a general election on April 28, Ottawa would look at how the planned purchase of 88 Lockheed Martin F-35 fighters could be adjusted.】

item.title: Cognizant 将股票回购计划提高 20 亿美元
item.description: 认知技术公司（Cognizant Technology）周二表示，董事会已批准将该 IT 咨询公司目前的股票回购计划增加 20 亿美元，以进一步提高股东回报。【原文：Cognizant Technology said on Tuesday its board has approved a $2 billion increase to the IT consulting company's current share repurchase plan, as it sharpens focus on bolstering shareholder returns.】

item.title: 特朗普的世界自由金融加密企业称将推出稳定币
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）在周二的一份声明中表示，该公司将推出一种与美元挂钩的稳定币，名为USD1，由美国国债、美元和其他现金等价物支持。【原文：Donald Trump's World Liberty Financial crypto venture will launch a dollar-pegged stablecoin called USD1, backed by U.S. Treasuries, dollars and other cash equivalents, it said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 如果放松制裁，俄罗斯能源贸易可能会发生哪些变化
item.description: 随着旨在结束乌克兰战争的会谈继续进行，可能减轻对俄罗斯（包括其庞大的能源部门）的制裁是议程上的议题之一。【原文：As talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine continue, a potential relief in sanctions imposed on Russia, including its vast energy sector, is one of the issues on the agenda.】

item.title: 迪拜阿联酋 NBD 银行与贝莱德合作提供私人市场准入服务
item.description: 迪拜阿联酋国民银行（Emirates NBD）周二在一份声明中表示，该行正与贝莱德（BlackRock）合作，为其财富管理客户提供进入另类资产类别的机会，重点是私人市场。【原文：Dubai's Emirates NBD bank is teaming up with BlackRock to offer its wealth management clients opportunities to access alternative asset classes, with a focus on private markets, it said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 倍耐力中意股东就公司治理问题发生冲突
item.description: 两位消息人士称，倍耐力的中国股东和意大利股东在集团治理问题上意见不一，可能导致这家轮胎制造商无法在定于周三召开的董事会上批准其2024年的财务业绩。【原文：Chinese and Italian shareholders in Pirelli are at odds over the group's governance, two sources said, potentially leading to a failure to approve the tyremaker's financial results for 2024 at a board meeting scheduled for Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒商品通胀上升 "无济于事
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二表示，美联储的利率政策仍然是限制性的，而且定位良好，但自去年夏天以来，将通胀率拉回到央行2%目标的进展已经放缓，最新数据中出现的商品通胀上扬 "于事无补"。【原文：Federal Reserve interest rate policy remains restrictive and well-positioned, Fed Governor Adriana Kugler said on Tuesday, but progress on bringing inflation back to the central bank's 2% target has slowed since last summer and the uptick in goods inflation seen in the latest data is "unhelpful."】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者 Keith Meister 将加入 Illumina 董事会
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者基思-梅斯特（Keith Meister）将加入基因测序制造商 Illumina 董事会，现任董事会成员斯科特-戈特利布（Scott Gottlieb）将出任董事长。【原文：Activist investor Keith Meister will join the board of gene-sequencing maker Illumina , and current board member Scott Gottlieb will become chairman, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关于特朗普助手用于分享战争计划的 Signal 消息应用程序的须知
item.description: 特朗普政府的高级官员使用消息应用程序 Signal 分享战争计划，并错误地将一名记者纳入了加密聊天，这引发了民主党议员要求国会调查这一安全漏洞的呼声。【原文：Top Trump administration officials used messaging app Signal to share war plans and mistakenly included a journalist in the encrypted chat, spurring calls by Democratic lawmakers for a congressional investigation into the security breach.】

item.title: 物流公司 Kuehne+Nagel 将从全球贸易战的复杂性中获利
item.description: 瑞士物流集团 Kuehne und Nagel 周二表示，该公司一直在利用日益复杂的全球贸易问题--从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税到红海危机--向客户收取更高的增值服务费。【原文：Swiss logistics group Kuehne und Nagel on Tuesday said it has been capitalizing on increasingly complex global trade issues - from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs to the Red Sea crisis - by charging customers more for value-added services.】

item.title: 施耐德电气将在美国投资超过 7 亿美元，助力人工智能蓬勃发展
item.description: 施耐德电气（Schneider Electric）周二表示，在关税威胁可能影响这家法国电气设备制造商之际，该公司计划在未来两年内向美国业务投资超过 7 亿美元。【原文：Schneider Electric said on Tuesday it plans to invest over $700 million in its U.S. operations over the next two years amid tariff threats that could affect the French electrical equipment maker.】

item.title: 调味品制造商麦考密克因支出增加，季度利润不及预期
item.description: 麦考密克周二公布的第一季度利润未达预期，原因是促销费用增加以及香料、调味汁和调味品降价未能刺激需求。【原文：McCormick missed first-quarter profit estimates on Tuesday, as higher promotional expenses and price cuts for its spices, sauces and seasonings fell short of boosting demand.】

item.title: 调味品制造商麦考密克因支出增加，季度利润不及预期
item.description: 麦考密克周二公布的第一季度利润未达预期，原因是促销费用增加以及香料、调味汁和调味品降价未能刺激需求。【原文：McCormick missed first-quarter profit estimates on Tuesday, as higher promotional expenses and price cuts for its spices, sauces and seasonings fell short of boosting demand.】

item.title: 中国商务部长会见波音全球总裁
item.description: 中国商务部在一份声明中说，中国商务部长王文涛周二会见了波音全球总裁布兰登-尼尔森，并呼吁该飞机制造商深化与中国航空业的合作。【原文：China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao met with President of Boeing Global Brendan Nelson on Tuesday, and called on the planemaker to deepen cooperation with China's aviation industry, the commerce ministry said in a statement.】

item.title: 特朗普下达新命令后，委内瑞拉对华石油贸易陷入停滞
item.description: 在美国针对中国从伊朗进口石油实施制裁几天后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令威胁对从加拉加斯购买石油的国家征收关税，从而带来了新的不确定性。【原文：Trade of Venezuelan oil to top buyer China stalled on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump's order threatening tariffs on countries buying from Caracas created fresh uncertainty, days after U.S. sanctions targeting China's imports from Iran.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称欧盟将结束对苹果浏览器选项的调查
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士周二表示，在苹果公司做出修改以符合里程碑式的规定之后，欧盟反垄断监管机构将结束对苹果公司 iPhone 浏览器选项长达一年的调查。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are set to close their year-long investigation into Apple's browser options on iPhones after the company made changes to comply with the requirements set out in landmark rules, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标信心游戏
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔任命大卫-斯威尔（David Sewell）领导先进材料部门，为分拆上市做准备
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周二表示，已任命大卫-斯威尔（David Sewell）领导其先进材料业务，该业务将于今年年底或 2026 年初分拆为一家独立的上市公司。【原文：Honeywell said on Tuesday it has appointed David Sewell to lead its advanced materials business, which is set to be spun off into an independently listed company by late this year or early 2026.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 公司计划于 2026 年在华盛顿特区推出自动驾驶汽车。
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周二表示，它的目标是明年在美国首都推出完全自动驾驶的打车服务。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit Waymo said on Tuesday it aims to launch its fully autonomous ride-hailing service in the U.S. capital city next year.】

item.title: 默克在最新中国交易中购买心脏病药物的权利
item.description: 默克公司与江苏恒瑞医药集团签署了一项价值高达 20 亿美元的心脏病药物许可协议，这是美国制药商最近与中国企业签署的一系列交易中的最新一笔。【原文：Merck has signed a licensing agreement for a heart disease drug with Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals worth up to $2 billion, the latest in a series of deals U.S. drugmakers have recently signed with China-based firms.】

item.title: 同步银行：美国消费者因通胀而放缓支出
item.description: 消费金融公司 Synchrony Financial 的数据显示，由于物价高企和经济前景恶化，美国消费者开始抑制消费。【原文：U.S. consumers are starting to curb their spending in response to high prices and a worsening economic outlook, according to consumer finance company Synchrony Financial .】

item.title: 特朗普主导的反弹势头减弱，华尔街期货下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周二下跌，此前一天，华尔街股指因特朗普政府可能对关税采取较温和态度的暗示而飙升至两周高点。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped on Tuesday, a day after Wall Street indexes surged to two-week highs on hints that the Trump administration might adopt a softer approach to tariffs.】

item.title: 加拿大航空航天集团警告说，新关税可能会提高发动机维修和零部件成本
item.description: 据加拿大航空航天贸易团体称，随着美国主导的新一轮贸易战迫在眉睫，美国关税升级和加拿大报复性关税可能会提高从飞机零部件到发动机维修等项目的成本。【原文：Escalating U.S. tariffs and Canadian retaliatory duties could raise costs on items from aircraft components to engine repairs, according to aerospace trade groups in Canada, as a fresh round of the U.S.-led trade war looms.】
